nodes.text: The Gladiator II-class Star Destroyer was the second sub-class of the Gladiator-class line of Star Destroyers used by the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War. It was preceded by the Gladiator I-class Star Destroyer.
According to Star Wars: Armada cards the Gladiator II has better anti-starfighter capabilities than the Gladiator I, furthermore some of the guns able to fire to the sides have increased ranges.
